dcterms:description: The OLAT dataset consists of images captured under controlled lighting conditions, where only one light source is active at a time, allowing for the acquisition of the reflectance field of a human face.
dcterms:title: OLAT (One-Light-At-A-Time) Dataset

dcterms:creator: Abhimitra Meka

Peter Barnum
Philip David-Son
Daniel Erickson
Yinda Zhang
Jonathan Taylor
Soﬁen Bouaziz
dcterms:description: The Dynamic OLAT dataset extends the original OLAT dataset by capturing dynamic facial expressions and poses, enabling the synthesis of relightable textures and volumetric performance capture.
dcterms:title: Dynamic OLAT Dataset
